extendedInfo.description: What makes Lebron James a special basketball player is not necessarily his skill, but rather his physical attributes that allow him to dominate! Fitivityâs Basketball Strength app provides workouts that can improve your strength and allow you to be more effective on the court. As the level of play rises, physicality and intensity become of vital importance, and if your body does not allow you to compete, then your skills are of little use.Build strength with basketball workouts that will bring you results! Have the ability to overpower defenders as you make a move and finish at the rim. Box out your man without exhausting yourself. Maintain strength while other basketball players fade in the 4th quarter.Basketball can become a much easier game as you progress with your workouts!Includes:-	5 levels of strength workouts to elevate your game!-	Video demonstrations and descriptions of workouts to insure proper technique!
